XenotypeDef.label: Ghoul
XenotypeDef.description: Ghouls were once humans who failed to get into a protective shelter during a bombing. Irradiation gave them increased resistance to radiation; they also gain a bonus to resistance to poison. Unfortunately, they are too physically weak to use heavy weapons.
